workout_file.author: Zwift
workout_file.name: Week 4.3 - Sweet Spot Pyramid - 50min
workout_file.description: A sweet spot focused workout where you'll accumulate 50min in total at that intensity.

textevent.message: We have some sweet spot work on tap for today, my friend.
Let's get rolling here and start with a 10min warmup at ~85 RPM.
Keep easing into the day here. Hopefully the pedal stroke is feeling more fluid.
All right, let's chat about what's in store today.
We have a sweet spot pyramid today consisting of 5, 10min intervals.
With base of the pyramid being at 88% FTP, and the peak at 93% FTP.
And very short rest periods in between of only 2min.
Which is intentional to keep you working for in essence the entire main set :-)
You can thank me later! Let's carry on with the warmup.
Another minute to go, then we'll take a quick breather before the main set.
Nice and easy here. Take a drink and a few deep breaths.
In 1min our 1st interval starts. We're aiming for a comfortable cadence for these today.
All right, here we go! Lift the cadence just slightly to 90 RPM.
Use these 1st couple of minutes to just settle down.
Good, now get into the groove and stay in control here.
Halfway through here! You should feel comfortable still.
2min to go. Keep your breathing from going ragged and stay steady.
Just a bit longer, then we'll take a quick 2min rest.
Nicely done. That's 1 down and 4 to go. Take a few deep breaths here.
Next up we're going just a bit higher in intensity, but still at 90 RPM.
Lift the cadence up again now.
And let's settle into that same rhythm as before.
At this intensity, it should feel like work.
But, work you could perform for a long time if you wanted to.
Halfway through! Keep calm and under control still here.
Relax the shoulders, bend the elbows, and relax your hands.
Let's finish this last 30sec up!
Way to go! That one looked awesome. Let's take a quick rest again here.
All right, we're at the peak of the pyramid next, get ready for a bit more intensity.
Still at 90 RPM here, but now into low zone 4. Get into the groove.
Sweet spot is great training for the time crunched athlete.
Because it provides great training stimulus in a short amount of fatigue.
With minimal residual fatigue which leads to greater repeatability.
And why it is prevalent in this workout plan :-)
More than halfway through here! Remember to keep drinking.
2min left for this peak interval, you're looking great!
Just a little bit more, push all the way to the arch!
Nice! Now we head back down the pyramid again :-)
Okay, back to high zone 3 next at 90 RPM.
Here we go! This is when you may start feeling some fatigue and ache in the legs.
Keep pushing yourself and get through this!
We're aiming for 50min of sweet spot today in just 70min of workout.
This is a super high quality workout, and is something you can repeat each week.
To see steady improvement in your aerobic capacity.
More than halfway through again, you're doing awesome today!
Final minute! Let's finish this one up strong!
Just 1 more interval to go, and we're done! Rest up here.
Okay, back to the base of the pyramid next, at 90 RPM.
Here we go! The final 10min of work today, let's make it happen!
Steady as you go. Make sure your form is solid here, even though you're fatigued.
Shoulders relaxed, elbows bent, light grip on the bars.
Almost there now! Keep at it!
Homestretch! Keep the pressure on right to the arch!
Get there!
Superb! Way to knock out 50min of sweet spot, my friend!
We'll spend a few minutes cooling down now.
See you next time :-)
